p: The drying of the aerial parts of the plants was carried out at room temperature, in the shade. The essential oils were obtained by hydrodistillation using a Clevenger device for 3 hr. The oil was dissolved in hexane (Merck, Darmstadt, Germany), dried on anhydrous sodium sulfate, and stored at 4–6°C in sealed vials in the dark (Sonboli et al., 2019).
